attributes.action: Gurkha Regts to Troop the Colour for HM Queen in 2015
attributes.additional_details: 2015 will be the 200th Anniversary of Gurkha's serving with and in the British Army. To celebrate this relationshiop, thank those who currently serving with Gurkhas Regts or in the British Army, and the people of Nepal, the Queen should be asked to allow the current Gurkha Regiments should Troop the Colour to celebrate the Queens Birthday in June 2015.
